title: 4 Feeder Bots in a single Co-op game....Nice.....

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
This is actually ridiculous, I have no idea how new people to the game would be motivated to play with this shite going on. Trying to win a 1 v 9 is truly    {{summoner:3}}ing.
You know they're feeder bots when they buy boots of speed and walk into lane, but also the seemingly generated usernames they have tends to be a giveaway in champion select.

replies.body: Hey dude, just report each of them. The accounts are usually running on a script until they hit Level 30 and can be sold.

unfortunately it won't do much but keep trying anyway. Despite what riot says, they tolerate bots in low level games since most the community is already lvl30 and it'd a difficult issue to keep under control without further complaints.
The thing is I had games where when we finish their lvl was still 30 and they kept botting.
that's called ip farming so they can unlock all champs, runes and rune pages.

LOL having this a lot in bot games, hey it's good I can practice more, at least we have valid excuse for losing.

Early version of Doombots hh, still I report the bots. Idk why riot hasn't done anything about this 4rd party program thing that they're using but it's still annoying when they keep feeding.
